From the previous transaction history, I see that there's a transaction with the subject "Purchase at Apple Store: iPhone 3GS" and another transaction with the subject "Rent" with an amount of 1000.0. I'll assume that the "Rent" transaction with an amount of 1000.0 is the previous bill payment.
